name: Until Die
description:
How long can you survive until you die? 

UNTIL DIE is an endless turn-based strategy minigame. You play as a BUTTERFLY, struggling in the last moment of its life. Caught within spider webs that nothing can escape from, will you choose to give up and become the food, or will you try to resist the rule of nature?

This game created to participate in the Mini Jam 123: Web. The limitation is 'There is no ground.'

  • Point-and-Click game. No keyboard input!
  • Helpful items that can make you last longer.
  • CUTE Spiders!!
  • Click on any nodes to move the butterfly away from spiders.
  • When you move to an item, it will activate:
  •    Bomb : It will randomly destroy a spider on the web.
  •    Watch: It will stop the spiders' turn for a while.
  •    Wing: You can teleport to any nodes on the web.

Pixel Art Effect: NYKNCK
Sound Effects: GameSupplyGuy

Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)
